name: chaos god (Blockhead manic)
description:
how to play:

WASD / arrow keys or drag the plane with the mouse to move around, use Q and E or middle mouse to rotate, use the number keys to choose what to spawn and to spawn things just right click. Also to zoom in or out you can use the R and F or use the scroller on the mouse. Oh yah, one more thing: click on a person or a car to follow it and click the ESC button to stop following.

warning: this game can be very laggy .

story:

a god who came from a different universe comes to cause chaos in a little peaceful town but is the town really peaceful? is it really a good town? you get to choose if they live or not! destroy and kill or watch this town grow and become a lovely town. its all up to you, god of chaos!

this game right now is only a prototype so sorry if you run into any bugs or find it boring then just comment down below what should be add or what needs to be fix.

you can also download it for better game play(hopefully );

-by blockhead manic ;)
